query:
ALTER TABLE task_rotation_occurrence_notes 
ADD COLUMN isSpecial TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN specialName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN specialDate TIMESTAMP NULL;
